file_content.text: We managed to round up all the pirates who ran away. They won't be giving us any more trouble. Not for a while.
They're fleeing north through the ice field. Delta team--head south and cut them off. Out.
Great job destroying the comm system! I'm organizing my men to round up the pirate technicians who escaped. And the best part--no interference. Thank you.
No problem.
They put up quite a fight.
Yeah, pirates are a pretty tough bunch.
I didn't even break a sweat.
This may not drive them off Hoth, but it'll make it a lot more difficult for them to attack the trade lanes. We could use the break.
Have you destroyed the pirates' communication equipment yet?
Come in, Dena. Repeat, come in, Dena. Respond--
Blast it! I enjoy irony, but this is just ridiculous.
I'm organizing a strike to take out the White Maw's comm systems, but their transmitter keeps interfering with ours. I can't contact my men.
The White Maw is certainly persistent.
More pirate trouble....
They're like bugs. You kill a few, another whole nest springs up somewhere else.
Why don't you just jam their signal?
There must be a technical fix.
We've tried. Unfortunately, money buys the best tech heads. They're one step ahead of us every time.
The communications network keeps the pirate factions coordinated. Every time they organize a deep space raid, we're buried in static.
We can't respond, can't receive updates on Imperial activities... nothing.
Listen, I know you--can you help? I'm worried the pirates have intercepted my signal, and they'll move their comm systems before we can strike.
What do you need?
I need you to destroy their communications equipment. All of it. Make sure there's nothing left that they can rebuild.
Let me deliver the message by hand.
I can contact your men.
I appreciate the thought, but by the time you make contact, the pirates will be gone.
Why should I be bothered?
We lost a whole battalion last week because they couldn't send a distress call. We're losing Hoth.
As long as that comm system is up, we'll keep losing good men here and all over the Outer Rim. I need you to destroy their systems now.
I'll take out the pirates' equipment for you.
You can count on me.
If they are endangering innocent lives, they must be stopped.
Of course I'll help
Pirates like that give people like me a bad name. Count me in.
Sure. I'll help out.
Clear communications is the cornerstone of a successful campaign. I'll put a stop to their interference.
You can count on me.
Fine, you've convinced me.
Be prepared for some heavy resistance. The pirates will do anything to protect their profits.
People die. [Refuse quest]
That's a pretty bleak view of the world you have there. Excuse me while I try and get a hold of my men again.
Dena? You there? Den--sorry, can't talk right now. I'm trying to get a hold of my men.
If they're causing trouble, just take them out from the air.
So? Bomb them.
Already suggested it, but they've got shield generators online.
You'll find the communications equipment in a cave they use as their base of operations. Good luck.
Let's wipe the pirates out.
